description:
Learn the Basics of Energy Healing, How to "Play with Energy" to develop sensitivity/awareness of energy in your hands, and How to Offer Self Healing. This course is taught by Rev Martina Schmidt with 21 years experience in the healing field, 17 years of those being in energy medicine.

This course is a prerequisite for those who are interested in the School of Energy Medicine's Healing Training Program.
title: Introduction to Energy Healing
